iati-activity.title: The Active Learning Centre:Rights advice and information to promote access to justice in Mongochi and Dedza
iati-activity.description: This project will contribute to the strengthening of civil society and in particular to ensuring that the most vulnerable are able to access justice and protect their human rights. The project will operate in two districts of Malawi â€“ Mangochi and Dedza. They will pilot a method by which supported and trained volunteer paralegals can assist people to claim their rights through the establishment of advice centres and outreach clinics in rural areas. The project will work from the main centres within Dedza and Mangochi and will try out methods of delivering rights advice and information in the surrounding rural areas to inform future provision of access to justice. The advice centres and rural outreach clinics will establish links with the Ministry of Justice's Legal Aid scheme, the Office of the Ombudsman and the Human Rights Commission to assist those who need help in pursuing their cases. By the end of the project, 100 paralegals will have been trained to offer accurate rights information and advice to vulnerable groups.
